title: ASL 6.2 ‚Äî Giving & Asking for Directions (Campus/City/Event) üè´üèôÔ∏èüé™
objectives: Ask for and give directions using time-first and space anchoring
Integrate common landmarks (SCHOOL, STORE, HOSPITAL, GYM, EVENT) with consistent loci
Use RS perspective shift between asker and giver of directions
Add NMM for distance (far vs near) and confirmation (nod vs puzzled face)

vocab.def: NMM with CL path: puffed cheeks (far), small close space (near).
H-hand taps shoulder in cross motion.

sections.heading: Warm-Up: Asking Questions
sections.body: Drill **WHERE, HOW-TO, HOSPITAL, GYM, EVENT.** Pair each with WH-NMM (furrowed brows). Example: **HOSPITAL WHERE?**

sections.heading: Model: Ask ‚Üí Give ‚Üí Confirm

media.caption: RS swap: A asks, B gives

sections.body:
Sequence:
‚Ä¢ **RS‚ÜíA (asker):** **EXCUSE WHERE GYM?**
‚Ä¢ **RS‚ÜíB (giver):** **FROM HERE CL:1 STRAIGHT, LEFT, BUILDING GYM.**
‚Ä¢ **RS‚ÜíA (confirm):** **OH I SEE, THANK-YOU.**

sections.heading: Partner Drill: City Map

media.alt: Grid map with school, store, hospital, gym
media.caption: Anchor 4 landmarks in space

sections.body: Anchor **SCHOOL, STORE, HOSPITAL, GYM.** Partner A asks about one location, Partner B gives directions. Include **near/far NMM** and at least one **classifier path (CL:1 or CL:3)**.

sections.heading: Model: Event Directions
sections.body: Add **EVENT/FESTIVAL** anchor. Example: **TOMORROW EVENT FESTIVAL. FROM SCHOOL DRIVE CL:3 STRAIGHT, RIGHT, ARRIVE.** Use **RS‚Üígiver** to explain; **RS‚Üíasker** nods to confirm.

sections.heading: Mini-Showcase
sections.body: Record **20‚Äì25s**: one asker/giver dialogue. Include: **1 WH-question, 1 CL path, 2 landmarks, near/far NMM, RS swap, neutral return.**
sections.teacherNote: Captions should note which landmarks were anchored and how near/far was marked.

quiz.title: ASL 6.2 ‚Äî Giving & Asking for Directions Quiz
